name: Ball (LegendAlf101)
description:
The evil King Cube is jealous of the Balls as they can roll and he cant! So kidnaps them all instead!

The Evil Tyrant! 

Its up to you both to save all of Ballkind or die trying...

Ball is a multiplayer 3D platformer game and consists of two game modes:

Competitive and Cooperative.

Beat your mates and become the victor in the competitive game mode and work together to defeat King Cube in the cooperative game mode.
